TermDefinition.DefinitionText: A cell (such as a phagocyte or a macrophage) that responds to many antigens, not just one antigen.

MediaLink.alt: Pronunciation of dictionary term "nonspecific immune cell"
Pronunciation of dictionary term "célula inmunitaria inespecífica"

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Una célula (por ejemplo, un fagocito o un macrófago) que responde a muchos antígenos, no ante uno solo.
